mapper.select: select uuid,date,type,title,sort_score,excerpt from schedule where `type` between 1 and 3 and del_flg = 0 order by date desc

select uuid,date,type,title,excerpt from schedule where `type` between 1 and 3 and del_flg = 0 and publish_start < #{param2} and publish_end > #{param1} order by sort_score desc,`date`desc, create_datetime desc LIMIT 8
mapper.insert:
insert into schedule( uuid, date, type, title, sort_score, excerpt, publish_start, publish_end, create_datetime, update_datetime, del_flg, note ) values ( #{uuid}, #{date}, #{type}, #{title}, #{sortScore}, #{excerpt}, #{publishStart}, #{publishEnd}, #{createDatetime}, #{updateDatetime}, #{delFlg}, #{note} )
select @@IDENTITY
mapper.delete: update schedule set del_flg = #{delFlg} where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update schedule set date = #{date}, type = #{type}, title = #{title}, sort_score = #{sortScore}, excerpt = #{excerpt}, publish_start = #{publishStart}, publish_end = #{publishEnd}, create_datetime = #{createDatetime}, update_datetime = #{updateDatetime}, del_flg = #{delFlg}, note = #{note} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,uuid,date,type,title,sort_score,excerpt,publish_start,publish_end from schedule where del_flg = 0 and id = #{id}

select
from schedule where del_flg = 0 and type = #{type} order by date desc

select count(id) as totalCount from schedule where del_flg = 0 and type = 5
and date_format(`date`,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
and sort_score = #{sortScore}
and date_format(publish_start,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{publishStart},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(publish_end,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{publishEnd},'%Y-%m-%d')
select count(id) as totalCount from schedule where del_flg = 0 and type = 5;
